name: doctorlink
description: DoctorLink is on a mission to simplify the path to better healthcare. Our vision is to become the world’s most trusted route to health and wellbeing for over 500 million people. DoctorLink is addressing the challenges faced by healthcare providers in today’s ever more demanding landscape. Our technology is enabling healthcare providers across the globe to transform the services they offer patients and deliver quality care more effectively and efficiently. We are backed by Eight Roads, the VC arm of Fidelity, and are led by a team of clinical, healthcare and technology professionals who deeply understand the challenges that the healthcare sector faces and how they can be addressed with new technology.

team.title: CTO
team.name: Alfonso Ferrandez
team.bioHtml: Technologist with an eye in the future, always working on what comes next.

team.title: Chief People Officer
team.name: Thea Fineren
team.bioHtml: Growing businesses by Talent Attraction, Development and Experience. DoctorLink, Treatwell, TransferWise, Amex, Capgemini

jobs.title: Sales Director - US Healthcare
jobs.description:
About Doctorlink

Our purpose at Doctorlink is to simplify the path to better health care, and our vision is to become the world’s most trusted route to health and wellbeing. Doctorlink is addressing the challenges faced by healthcare providers in today’s ever more demanding landscape. Our technology is enabling healthcare providers across the globe to transform the services they offer patients and deliver quality care more effectively and efficiently. We are backed by Eight Roads, the venture capital arm of Fidelity, and are led by a team of clinical, healthcare and technology professionals. As a business, we deeply understand the challenges that the healthcare sector faces and how these can be addressed with new technology.

This Sales Director position will play a key role in the delivery of the business development function within Doctorlink, working closely with other members of the sales team and matrix working with technical and operational colleagues. This role is solely focussed at customers within the US Healthcare market and will be responsible for growing Doctorlink’s presence Stateside. The Sales Director will provide an effective and customer-focused service – leading the sales relationship with the economic buyers and other influencers across the American Healthcare industry. As such the Sales Director must have experience in a senior position within the US healthcare industry and a strong understanding of health landscapes and challenges that Doctorlink can address.

The organisation is a fluid and evolving environment and it is expected you are able to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams and manage multiple interfaces linking into other areas of the business while providing outstanding customer experience and converting qualified leads into sales.



Key Responsibilities

- Support the Managing Director in the development and implementation of Doctorlink’s Sales Strategy, working with BD colleagues, as well as Technical leads on delivery, ensuring that plans are implemented on time, and to a high standard.
- Working with the Operational Team to evaluate with existing customers how Doctorlink can offer additional products in support of each customer’s individual needs.
- Ensure Doctorlink develops and maintains an excellent understanding of current and future customers and their strategic context, helping to ensure services respond to customer requirements and changes in the market place.
- Identify threats to the business pipeline and strategy through robust competitor analysis, working with sales colleagues to mitigate.
- Lead the development of new business through well-developed internal and external networks. Ensure the full capability and expertise of Doctorlink is harnessed through drawing in senior leadership, bringing together the insight from across the organisation and networking to understand the competitive landscape.
- Lead on all sales meetings and the provision of customer information.
- Be responsible for identifying representatives and material for pre-tender and bid evaluation presentations.


Experience:

- Must have in-depth knowledge and sales experience within the US Healthcare markets.
- Must have an understanding of Customer Relationship Management systems; Salesforce experience would be advantageous.
- Self-starter who is target-driven and motivated – must be comfortable in a target-oriented environment
- Proven ability to deliver against sales targets and objectives
- Established experience within SaaS sales
- Sales experience of solution-based selling would be an advantage
- Good technical understanding potentially including software or SaaS solutions
- Excellent communication skills – telephone, written and face to face
- Proven ability to build relationships and to take relationships forward into commercial success
- Excellent time management, an individual who thrives on working autonomously
- The ideal candidate will be determined, outgoing, honest and open, positive, articulate and diplomatic


Benefits

What’s in it for me?

Incredible support, tools and the training to excel in your career
You’ll get to work in one of our tech hubs in either Covent Garden in London or Beaconsfield in Buckinghamshire.
An excellent compensation package including a healthcare cash-plan, 5% pension, bonus, Life assurance, 25 days leave, employee discount platform including 20% off restaurants in Covent Garden and of course all the usual free food and drink.


Where do I sign up?

If you want to be part of something special and join a nimble, well-funded, pre-IPO, talented team, using the latest tech to develop solutions that make a real difference to people’s lives, then we want to hear from you.





-

Some extra info that’s important to us:

We welcome applications from all sections of the community as an Equal Opportunities employer. We are also happy to make any reasonable adjustments at any stage of the recruitment process should you need it, please just let us know.

We take your data privacy seriously and commit to processing your data in line with GDPR guidelines. Please see our Privacy Notice detailing how we manage your applicant data. By proceeding through the applicant stage we understand that you are in agreement on how we will manage your data.

We’ll need to take background checks relevant to the role, which will include a Right to Work check, employment references and a DBS check.

jobs.title: Sales Director - Health Care/ Health Tech
